name: Panzer Campaigns 2:  Normandy `44
summary: HPS Simulations and John Tiller are proud to announce the release of Normandy '44, an operational level World War II simulation. Normandy '44 covers the D-Day invasion from June 6th 1944 and the ensuing fight to break out from the beachhead.
info:
• 开发: HPS Simulations
  • 游戏类型: Strategy
  • 售价: $49.95
  • 官方网站: http://www.hpssims.com/Pages/Products/PZC/PZC_normandy/panzer_campaigns_normandy.html
